description: GCD-convolution of squares A000290 with themselves.
links: Danny Rorabaugh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n-2) = Sum_{d|n, d<n} d^2*phi(n/d). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 27 2003
mathematica: Table[Sum[d^2*EulerPhi[(n + 2)/d], {d, Most@ Divisors[n + 2]}], {n, 0, 47}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 20 2015 *)
prog: (Sage) sum([d^2*euler_phi(int((n+2)/d)) for d in range(1,n+2) if (n+2)%d==0]) # _Danny Rorabaugh_, Mar 20 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
